name: The Hunky Bunker Chronicles: Chapter 1
description:
This is my first attempt at creating a RPG/visual novel in PowerPoint. I call it a PRPG. Though it has few RPG elements I feel as if it's the best way to describe it. Lemme know if you enjoy it!!! 

P.S. I don't mean to offend any furries playing the game. This is all satire and purely a parody of the culture. I wish no ill will in the use of the term "Furry" and I hope it doesn't offend anyone.
